content.text: Aurora Aqua · Aquaculture platform
Aurora Aqua is the umbrella for data-driven aquaculture—helping farms, integrators and partners move from scattered logs to structured, visible operations.
Coastal Andhra, Tamil Nadu and Odisha with on-ground teams.
Structured logs, insights, partner APIs and offline-first field use.
Aurora Aqua is a set of connected layers—from daily farm operations to intelligence and partner integrations—built on one aquaculture data backbone.
Daily reality inside ponds and crops—logs, tasks, checklists, expenses and inventory. Aqua Sahay lives here.
Turning raw logs into decision-ready signals around risk, opportunity, seasonality and pond performance.
Sensors, labs, buyers and other systems that plug into the same aquaculture data backbone through clean APIs.
Every module is shaped with on-ground teams so the workflow fits how farms actually run.
Logs and tasks stay two taps away—even on patchy networks.
One backbone for sites, ponds and crops so decisions stay aligned.
Sensors, labs and buyers plug in without custom rewrites every season.

India is one of the fastest-growing aquaculture markets—shrimp, tilapia and carp across coastal Andhra, Tamil Nadu and Odisha. We work with farms, integrators and buyers to keep data flowing from ponds to decisions.
Ops teams and partners on the ground.
Shrimp and diversified species expansion.
Structured logs, feed and health data.
Clean APIs and field workflows.
Aqua Sahay is the first product coming out of Aurora Aqua. More modules will follow over time.
Farm-operations app for ponds and crops. Structured logs, tasks and visibility around daily aquaculture work.
Intelligence layer for farms and partners—dashboards, alerts and AI-powered recommendations on top of Aqua Sahay data.
A clean way for devices, labs and partner systems to plug into the same aquaculture data backbone.
If you're interested in Aqua Sahay or the broader roadmap, send us a short note with your context—pond count, species, region and what you're trying to improve.
Include your location, pond count and what you want to improve in the next 1–2 crops. We reply within 1 business day.
Aquaculture that runs like a modern business.
What Aurora Aqua covers
Operator-first principles
Aquaculture in India · where we operate
Products under Aurora Aqua
Talk to the Aurora Aqua team

• Early access cohorts in coastal clusters with on-ground support.• Data backbone for partners—labs, buyers, hatcheries and sensor OEMs.• Pilot analytics: survivability, feed conversion, water quality patterns.

images.alt: India map focused on coastal footprint
